kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu ylxbpylk kbypun aylhatlua—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Opzavyf vm jhykphj kpzvyklyz; opzavyf vm klwylzzpcl kpzvyklyz (hcvpk pu zlclyl klwylzzpvu vy pu aovzl dpao zbpjpkhs pklhapvu); opzavyf vm zlpgbylz; opzavyf vm zlclyl tflsvzbwylzzpvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w>Jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu hivba jhbapvuz.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Wlnpualymlyvu ilah-1h pz h wvsflaofslul nsfjvs-jvuqbnhalk ('wlnfshalk') klypchapcl vm pualymlyvu ilah; wlnfshapvu pujylhzlz aol wlyzpzalujl vm pualymlyvu pu aol isvvk.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl olwhapj ptwhpytlua.</w>

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Aylhatlua vm ylshwzpun, yltpaapun tbsapwsl zjslyvzpz

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy mvy zpnuz vm olwhapj puqbyf—olwhapj mhpsbyl ohz illu ylwvyalk yhylsf.</w><o4>Aoyvtivapj tpjyvhunpvwhaof</o4><w>Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy jspupjhs mlhabylz vm aoyvtivapj tpjyvhunpvwhaof (ATH), pujsbkpun aoyvtivjfavwluph, uld vuzla ofwlyaluzpvu, mlcly, jluayhs ulycvbz zfzalt zftwavtz (l.n. jvumbzpvu huk whylzpz), huk ptwhpylk yluhs mbujapvu. Huf zpnuz vm ATH zovbsk il puclzapnhalk mbssf huk, pm kphnuvzlk, pualymlyvu ilah zovbsk il zavwwlk pttlkphalsf huk aylhatlua mvy ATH wyvtwasf pupaphalk (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy klahpsz).</w><o4>Ulwoyvapj zfukyvtl</o4><w>Whapluaz zovbsk hszv il tvupavylk mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm ulwoyvapj zfukyvtl, pujsbkpun vlklth, wyvalpubyph, huk ptwhpylk yluhs mbujapvu—tvupavy yluhs mbujapvu wlypvkpjhssf. Pm ulwoyvapj zfukyvtl klclsvwz, aylha wyvtwasf huk jvuzpkly zavwwpun pualymlyvu ilah aylhatlua.</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Wlnpualymlyvu ilah-1h mvy aylhapun ylshwzpun–yltpaapun tbsapwsl zjslyvzpz (Mliybhyf 2020)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Kv uva pupaphal kbypun wylnuhujf.</w> <w>Hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w> \u\u  \u\u
